StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust_Name
StringTable.String: Crisis: The Brain Trust

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust_Dec
StringTable.String: Our intelligence officers have uncovered a clandestine group of scientists calling themselves "The Brain Trust" that have been secretly working on a mysterious project. We have not been able to figure out what they are up to, but we do know that they are using our precious resources to do it.

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust_Choice1Dec
StringTable.String: Offer to fund their little project, as long as they share any breakthroughs with us first.

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust_Choice1BonusDec
StringTable.String: +5 Benevolent, -250 Credits

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust_Choice2Dec
StringTable.String: Try and infiltrate their group and find out what they are planning.

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust_Choice2BonusDec
StringTable.String: +5 Pragmatic

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust_Choice3Dec
StringTable.String: Break up their little group, and make sure they stay focused on our goals.

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust_Choice3BonusDec
StringTable.String: +5 Malevolent

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust1_Name
StringTable.String: Crisis: The Brain Trust (part 2)

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust1_Dec
StringTable.String:
The Credits we have been pumping into "The Brain Trust" have bore fruit finally. They claim to have created a new type of Durantium Shielding, that should allow us to build a power plant that would substantially boost the Raw Production of any planet it is constructed on.
We are having our researchers fact check their findings, but honestly the math is beyond anything they understand.

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust1_Choice1Dec
StringTable.String: Sounds risky, see if they can find a way to use this tech to improve our existing power systems.

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust1_Choice1BonusDec
StringTable.String: {STATCHANCE}% Benevolent check

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust1_Choice2Dec
StringTable.String: This news is concerning, and perhaps we should spend some more credits to make sure it is safe.

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust1_Choice2BonusDec
StringTable.String: -250 Credits

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust1_Choice3Dec
StringTable.String: Let's build the thing and see what happens, what could go wrong?

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust1_Choice3BonusDec
StringTable.String: {STATCHANCE}% Science check

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust1a_Name
StringTable.String: Crisis: The Brain Trust - Success

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust1a_Dec
StringTable.String:
It appears "The Brain Trust" should have been called the "The Lame Trust". After a more detailed review of their findings, we have discovered that most of the test results were fake. They were just after government funding so they could all retire to a pleasure planet outside of our borders.
Despite this, we were able to salvage some of their research, and have been able to make our existing power systems slightly more efficient
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+5% Raw production on all colonies[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust1b_Name
StringTable.String: Crisis: The Brain Trust - Failure

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust1b_Dec
StringTable.String:
In an unfortunate turn of events, our fact checkers gave "The Brain Trust" the go-ahead to test their new technology on {PLANETNAME}.
The results were not what we expected. In fact, the entire "Brain Trust" was killed when the power system they were testing exploded and the shock wave disintegrated them and all the surrounding civilians.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-25% Raw production {PLANETNAME} for 10 turns[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust1c_Name
StringTable.String: Crisis: The Brain Trust - Success

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust1c_Dec
StringTable.String:
The extra Credits we put into testing "The Brain Trusts" new power plant has paid off. If we had built it as designed, it probably would have worked, but it would have also vibrated the brains of all the all the surrounding colonists into some sort of grey pudding.
With some work, we have been able to fix the issue. Yet the plant will not be quite as efficient, as the brain-melting version.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Can now build the Durantium Matrix Power Plant[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust1e_Name
StringTable.String: Crisis: The Brain Trust - Uncertain

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust1e_Dec
StringTable.String:
"The Brain Trust" has completed the design of their revolutionary new Durantium Matrix Power Plant. Everything appears safe to our scientists.
The only member of our fact-checking team who was concerned with the numbers seems to have gone missing. His colleagues assure us that he probably just needed a vacation.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Can now build the Durantium Matrix Power Plant[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust1f_Name
StringTable.String: Crisis: The Brain Trust - Uncertain

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust1f_Dec
StringTable.String:
"The Brain Trust" has completed the design of their revolutionary new Durantium Matrix Power Plant. There are some concerns building it might have an adverse effect on colonies' morale, but the production boost will probably make it worthwhile.
The only member of our fact-checking team who was concerned with the numbers seems to have gone missing, but his colleagues assure us that he probably just needed a vacation.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Can now build the Durantium Matrix Power Plant[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust1f1_Name
StringTable.String: Crisis: The Brain Trust - Success

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust1f1_Dec
StringTable.String:
The Durantium Matrix Power Plant has finally been completed. Our best scientists are quite frankly surprised that it is working just as "The Brain Trust" promised.
The members of the Brain trust are now all famous and have begun lucrative lecture tours throughout our civilization.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+10% Research to all colonies for 10 turns.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust1f2_Name
StringTable.String: Crisis: The Brain Trust - Failure

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust1f2_Dec
StringTable.String:
The Durantium Matrix Power Plant has finally been completed and is indeed producing record power levels. The bad news is that the amazing new Durantium Shielding resonates with the plant, providing a mind-numbing subsonic humming, which has made the colony we built it on absolutely miserable and crazy aggressive.
Unfortunately, the unhappy colonist tracked down the members of the brain trust before we could set them the task fixing the problem.

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust2_Name
StringTable.String: Crisis: The Brain Trust (part 2)

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust2_Dec
StringTable.String:
We have successfully infiltrated "the Brain Trust." It appears that they have been appropriating Durantium in large quantities. They think they can create a new type of shielding for power planets.
Our operatives think they are hoping to sell this tech to the highest bidder when they complete their research.

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust2_Choice1Dec
StringTable.String: Confront "The Brain Trust" and let them know they will be treated fairly, if they share this new technology with us.

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust2_Choice1BonusDec
StringTable.String: {STATCHANCE}% Diplomacy check

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust2_Choice2Dec
StringTable.String: Arrest "The Brain Trust." Seize their research, and force them to refund the Durantium they embezzled.

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust2_Choice2BonusDec
StringTable.String: {STATCHANCE}% Military check

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust2_Choice3Dec
StringTable.String: Arrest them all. Squeeze what you can out of them and then execute them as a lesson to would-be thieves.

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust2_Choice3BonusDec
StringTable.String: {STATCHANCE}% Malevolent check

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust2a_Name
StringTable.String: Crisis: The Brain Trust - Success

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust2a_Dec
StringTable.String:
With some diplomatic prodding, we were able to persuade "The Brain Trust" to come out of the shadows. They have shared their research with us and even told us the location of the Durantium that they embezzled.
In return, we have agreed not to shoot them into space without a ship.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+5% Research all colonies, +5 Pragmatic, +5 Durantium[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust2b_Name
StringTable.String: Crisis: The Brain Trust - Failure

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust2b_Dec
StringTable.String:
Our attempt to diplomatically confront "The Brain Trust" did not work out so well. The building they were hiding out in was accidentally disintegrated when one of our "negotiators" flipped a switch on one of their experiments. ` On the bright side, we did find the missing Durantium buried in the sub-basement.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+5 Durantium[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust2c_Name
StringTable.String: Crisis: The Brain Trust - Success

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust2c_Dec
StringTable.String:
We have successfully rounded up "The Brain Trust" and were able to seize most of their research. Our scientists think it will be quite useful, allowing us to increase the output of our existing power systems substantially. However they seem to have sold off the Durantium they embezzled.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+3% Raw Production all Colonies[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust2d_Name
StringTable.String: Crisis: The Brain Trust - Failure

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust2d_Dec
StringTable.String:
We were able to arrest several members of "The Brain Trust." Unfortunately, most of them managed to escape, along with the missing Durantium.
We were able to capture some of their research. Yet without being able to interrogate the rest of the members, we will not be able to finalize their project.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1% Research all Colonies[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust2e_Name
StringTable.String: Crisis: The Brain Trust - Success

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust2e_Dec
StringTable.String:
Our raid on "The Brain Trust" headquarters was successful. We even located our missing Durantium and after some "creative" interviews we were able to get some useful information out of each of the members before they lost the ability to talk.
Our Researchers are very excited with the results and have already found several ways to implement the new Durantium shielding technologies.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+5% Research all colonies, +10 Malevolent, +5 Durantium[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust2f_Name
StringTable.String: Crisis: The Brain Trust - Failure

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust2f_Dec
StringTable.String:
Unfortunately, our raid on "The Brain Trust" headquarters did not go as expected. One of the experimental devices they were working on was activated, and a strange shockwave disintegrated the building and its immediate surroundings. Our soldiers and all "The Brain Trust" members were instantly killed.
Luckily we were able to find the missing Durantium.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+5 Durantium, +5 Malevolent[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust3_Name
StringTable.String: Crisis: The Brain Trust (part 2)

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust3_Dec
StringTable.String:
It appears that the group calling themselves the "The Brain Trust" has been continuing to work together remotely. They have taken our attempts to break them up personally and have become actively hostile.
Our intelligence officers are of the opinion that they may be working on some sort of weapon.

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust3_Choice1Dec
StringTable.String: Send in our best negotiators to defuse the situation before it gets out of hand.

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust3_Choice1BonusDec
StringTable.String: {STATCHANCE}% Diplomacy check

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust3_Choice2Dec
StringTable.String: Set up surveillance on their communication. Find out what they are working on.

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust3_Choice2BonusDec
StringTable.String: {STATCHANCE}% Science check

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust3_Choice3Dec
StringTable.String: Arrest them all immediately, and find out what we can about the weapons project, by whatever means necessary.

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust3_Choice3BonusDec
StringTable.String: {STATCHANCE}% Military check

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust3a_Name
StringTable.String: Crisis: The Brain Trust - Success

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust3a_Dec
StringTable.String:
Our negotiators have convinced "The Brain Trust" that they need to come forward with their work, by offering them immunity to espionage laws they may have broken.
More surprisingly they have provided us with a new type of Durantium shielding that should allow us to create more robust hulls.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+20% Hit points to all ships [/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust3b_Name
StringTable.String: Crisis: The Brain Trust - Failure

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust3b_Dec
StringTable.String:
Our negotiators were not able to get "The Brain Trust" to surrender any of their research.
Unfortunately, the group managed to disappear shortly after our attempted contact. We have no idea what they were up to. All we can do is hope it does not end up in enemy hands.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+10 Benevolent[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust3c_Name
StringTable.String: Crisis: The Brain Trust - Success

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust3c_Dec
StringTable.String:
Our surveillance of "The Brain Trust" has proven to be quite lucrative. Not only were we able to discover the location of some of the Durantium they have embezzled, but we have also found that they had developed a new type of Durantium Shielding that they intend to use to make more powerful Mass Driver technology.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1 Mass Driver Damage to all ships, +3 Durantium[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust3d_Name
StringTable.String: Crisis: The Brain Trust - Failure

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust3d_Dec
StringTable.String:
Our attempts to surveil "The Brain Trust" have not been fruitful. They have managed to disappear from our networks utterly. Unfortunately, We have no idea what they were up to. All we can do is hope it does not end up in enemy hands.
The only good news is that we were able to track down their supply stash before they bolted.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+2 Durantium, +500 Credits[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust3e_Name
StringTable.String: Crisis: The Brain Trust - Success

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust3e_Dec
StringTable.String:
Our military has managed to round up all the entire "Brain Trust" before they could bolt.
After some not-so-friendly interrogation, we have discovered that they were planning on selling a new type of Durantium shielding to the highest bidder.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+10 Malevolent, +5% Hit points to all ships [/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust3f_Name
StringTable.String: Crisis: The Brain Trust - Failure

StringTable.Label: Crisis_BrainTrust3f_Dec
StringTable.String:
We have just received word from the Military that their attempt to round up "The Brain Trust" did not go well. Not only did they manage to vanish from our surveillance, but they also infected our networks with a nasty virus that is playing havoc with our existing research project.
Unfortunately, we still have no idea what they were up to. All we can do is hope it does not end up in enemy hands.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-25% Research for 10 turns[/COLOR]
